ygData.subject: Re: Holy swords
ygData.msgSnippet: * *I have Heard of a sword called Ghoulsbane I know it is a paladin only *sword and im also prett sure that it is a one handed weapon. * Aye, Ghoulbane moved
ygData.messageBody:
*
*I have Heard of a sword called Ghoulsbane I know it is a paladin only
*sword and im also prett sure that it is a one handed weapon.
*

Aye, Ghoulbane moved in Final from a 2H to a 1H sword. I don't know about
Truthbringer, another paladin only sword; I remember seeing a Guide with it
in Phase 3, and it was a 2H sword then. I really hope it's 2H now too! I
am maxed on my 2H slashing skill, but I have neglected my 1H slash for far
too long.

-- Amoroth
